definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
legendary bird with nine heads (old)/cunning or sly person
lit. the dog that bites doesn't show its teeth (idiom)/fig. the most sinister of people can look quite harmless
pinyin: yao3 ren2 de5 gou3 bu4 lou4 chi3

definition: to turn up without being invited/unsolicited
to sleep (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 睡覺|睡觉[shui4 jiao4]
worker who is capable but unpleasant to deal with
to bicker/to argue for the sake of arguing/to carry on poles (together with sb else)/to carry a coffin on poles
scoundrel with an honest demeanor/see also 蔫兒壞|蔫儿坏[nian1 r5 huai4]
lit. in the eyes of a lover appears 西施[Xi1 shi1] (idiom); fig. beauty is in the eye of the beholder
pinyin: qing2 ren2 yan3 li3 chu1 Xi1 shi1
